# dct-card-title

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Card Header
Display content and actions about a single subject. Card contents can include anything 
from images to headlines, supporting text, buttons, and lists

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                    | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If true, the card title is in a disabled state                                                                                                                                 | `boolean` | `false` |
| `overlay`  | `overlay`  | If true, the card title will be in an overaly state. Primarily for use  when the parent Card is displaying an Image only allowin the title to be displayed on top of the image | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot            | Description                       |
| --------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `"slot"`        | Container for the Title field     |
| `"sub-heading"` | Container for the Sub-Title field |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                       | Description                 |
| ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------- |
| `--dct-card-header-padding-left`           | card content padding left   |
| `--dct-card-header-padding-padding-bottom` | card content padding bottom |
| `--dct-card-header-padding-padding-top`    | card content padding top    |
| `--dct-card-header-padding-right`          | card content padding right  |
